item.title: Why OpenAI Is Partnering With This Indy 500-Winning Race Car Team
item.description: OpenAI’s logo is on an Indy car and Perplexity has a deal with Lewis Hamilton. How the racing industry is tapping into AI.

item.title: Lululemon is Suing Costco for Allegedly Selling Dupes of Its Products
item.description: This isn’t the first time the apparel company has levied a copycat accusation.

item.title: How AI Superintelligence Could Change Your Business—And Everyone Else’s
item.description: Superintelligent AI doesn’t exist yet, but companies like Meta are pouring billions into making it happen.

item.title: Hot to Create Better Prompts to Get the Most out of ChatGPT
item.description: When writing a prompt for ChatGPT or another AI chatbot, there are some simple guidelines to follow to get the best results.
